name: Suicide Run
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy. Original version: John P. Shay - Solar Software Ltd. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

You are flying over the surface of Mars, Bomb and shoot the rockets and fuel dumps, while dodging the mountain peaks. You have 4 ships per game try to get the highest possible score. Watch out for the asteroids.

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: Z
Move: Cursor UP/DOWN
Fire: Z
Bomb: X


Start the game: A
Move: Cursor UP/DOWN
Fire: A
Bomb: B

 

Suicide Run - Solar Software
